channel.title: [Help me] my steam games are ruined for this mod
channel.description:
Hello, sorry, my english is bad so i'm using translator.
i'm correctly installed this mod and and after 5 minutes to play the game this crash and my pc and my pc restarts automatically.
I tried several times but with the same result. disapointed, i unistall the mod but when I want to play a game on the same engine, happens to me the same error.
hope you can help me and again, sorry for my bad english.

item.title: [Help me] my steam games are ruined for this mod
item.dc:creator: pfannkuchen_gesicht
item.description:
clean your PC, it’s probably overheating.
It would be nice to know your hardware too.

Read full topic
